name: Bee Toy
description:
I was really fascinated by the shimmering behaviour of Giant Honey Bees and thought it'd be interesting to try and simulate the effect and make it interactive. The result turned out to be pretty relaxing - enjoy :)

How to use: 

Just click the bees! 

Press F to toggle fullscreen.

Sound settings can be found by clicking on the settings icon in the top left corner.
